title: Emerald and Diamond Grand Haaram - Manoharini Collection
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS clarity
G-H color) and vibrant Zambian Emeralds (AA quality). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and premium finish.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a cascading floral design, inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. The intricate diamond settings highlight the central Zambian Emeralds. The pendant showcases a modern heart-shaped design, surrounded by diamonds and complemented with traditional gold bead dangles. This piece seamlessly blends modern design with traditional South Indian artistry, reflecting both heritage and contemporary elegance.
colors: complemented by the rich green of the Zambian Emeralds and the warm yellow of the 18K gold.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and upscale cultural events. Also suitable for milestone birthdays and anniversaries where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Grand Haaram is more than just jewelry; it is an heirloom. The superior craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds and emeralds, and the unique blend of traditional and modern designs make it a treasured investment. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. Its timeless elegance makes it perfect for passing down through generations.
